review_title: Fits perfect, not too snug at all
review_content: I'm 5'5 155lbs. Ordered a medium. Fits perfect, not too snug at all. Doesn't look cheap. The colors and pAttern are so pretty in person. I received a lot of compliments. Everyone thought I got it from a expensive boutique.

totally worth it for style points alone. fit is flattering even for my fat ass, the XL is a true enough fit and the product doesn't run small. material is very thin, this jacket could probably keep you warm if a bird flapped its wings near you and that's about it, so don't plan on wearing this in the colder seasons.

I got a medium and it fits nicely. I think these are true to American sizes. I'm 5'4 150s with most weight below the waist. I could probably get away with a small and a half if that were a real size but this feels very comfortable and compliments my shape well. Very pleased.
I love this jacket firs great
Love it! Looks just like on the picture. Im 5'1 and 128lb i bought a Small size fit perfect

review_title: I bought a size small and the jacket fits pretty much exactly like on the model
review_content: I bought a size small and the jacket fits pretty much exactly like on the model

This product surprised me. I wasn't expecting high quality but it fit true to size. It's well made for the price and I really love the colors. (I purchased the blue floral) it's stunning. Zipper works well which is typically an issue with cheaper items. I'm a size12/14 and the large fits well. I even have room to layer.
I ordered a small and it fits perfectly. Its super cute. Love the color üòç

My jacket arrived today and I couldn't be more pleased! For the price, I was not expecting much, but this is a very nice jacket. I got the pink in XL and it fits perfectly. After reading reviews, I did size up when ordering. It's a soft, light weight material which will be perfect for cool summer evenings or air conditioning. So glad I got this!

In love with this ! My favorite Allegra K purchase ever ! Came nicely packaged and super fast delivery . The fabric is super soft the colors are beautiful . The pockets really work your hands fit in there . The collar is nice and comfortable and the sleeves are fitted at the bottom so no slouchy sleeves , perfect ! Around the waist it sits very nicely and I got the right size went with the chart so it closes as well so I have to option of wearing it open or closed . The colors are beautiful did I mention that? Perfect for summer nights and fall . Might get it another color .

Love this jacket! Fits me perfectly. Use the size chart and you can't go wrong. Looks exactly like the picture. I am tall (5'10 & 38D)and normally wear an XL or XXL. I used the size chart and got the XL. Beautiful jacket for a great price. I would have given 5 stars if the jacket was an inch or two longer. 3/4 sleeves fit as expected. Super cute and trendy for spring.
Im 5 feet and 115 lbs and xs fits perfect! It's super cute and great for spring and summer.
I am MORE than pleased with this! The fabric is really richly colored. It drapes beautifully, but is very thin...perfect for cool summer evenings!
This is really nice on. And the price is great!

Cute light weight jacket. I bought the green and it has pretty greens, blues and a touch of mauve. It looks great with my jeans, black slacks and royal blue pants. I bought the large and can wear it over a t-shirt or fitted sweater. It is true to size. The sleeve length is just right for me, but might not be long enough for someone tall.
Cute print and perfect weight for the fall days in CA. Looks great with both pencil style skirts and flare skirts. Also with capri pants.

This is very pretty and looks great with jeans! I think it is true to size and I have plenty of room to wear a shirt or sweater under the jacket. It is a satin type material and not heavy. I love the color too, mine is the pink floral.
The pattern in this is beautiful. I ordered a size larger than I wear after reading the reviews and it fits. Too light weight for cold weather, but will be great in the summer.
If you normally wear medium and don't want a jacket that feels confining when you use your arms, get large. I got green pink and blue. They are all lovely.

Just received today 4/4/17. Really really nice jacket. I am 5'5" 145 lbs and it fits good....a little a very little tight across shoulders but I would not go up to an xlg. I think it would be too big. I am keeping...I luv it

review_title: Light comfortable jacket. Exactly same as pick
review_content: Light comfortable jacket. Exactly same as pick. Fits as expected. Bought size S I'm 5'2 120 pounds. Very current and not cheap looking at all. Comparable to some seen in high end stores for 5 times more money.
I love this jacket! Usually bomber jackets fit so tight and sit high on me but this one didn‚Äôt. It was perfect!!! Light weight perfect over a nice low cut top
My daughter loved the jacket! The colors are bright and fit well. She is 5' 6" and wears medium/larger but got the x large. It gives her room to breathe and is comfortable.

review_title: In love with this thing though
review_content: Fits as pictured. So no, it wont fit your whole arm most likely. In love with this thing though.
This is a great bomber jacket! I‚Äôm a size 12/14 and got a large. Fits great!!

Meant for complements more than comfort, haha. Actually, it is comfortable.. but not meant to be worn for warmth if that's what you're looking for. The only sizing thing I would note is that the bands at the end of the sleeves are not all that loose or stretchy so if you don't have super small forearms or just like to have that place loose then maybe go a size up. Love this bomber!

review_title: Great colors and very soft material
review_content: Very colorful jacket. Material is very soft. Very pretty addition to the wardrobe.
Way better than I expected!!!! The Medium size fits my 5'5" 155lbs 36c frame perfectly! Pockets are sleek and not bulky, the finish is gorgeous. . The green/ blue is deep and rich and gorgeous!!!!
I loved the floral pattern. Its a bit dark and the bomber style gives it a more youngish look.

I am a size 2 or 4 top. Got the small. Fits perfect. If you want a lose fit you have to order a size up. Looks exactly like the picture. Great light weight silky jacket for the summer when chilly indoors or to wear in spring. Like that I can wash, feels and looks like silk even though polyester.

review_title: Fits perfect, not too snug at all
review_content: I'm 5'5 155lbs. Ordered a medium. Fits perfect, not too snug at all. Doesn't look cheap. The colors and pAttern are so pretty in person. I received a lot of compliments. Everyone thought I got it from a expensive boutique.

totally worth it for style points alone. fit is flattering even for my fat ass, the XL is a true enough fit and the product doesn't run small. material is very thin, this jacket could probably keep you warm if a bird flapped its wings near you and that's about it, so don't plan on wearing this in the colder seasons.

I got a medium and it fits nicely. I think these are true to American sizes. I'm 5'4 150s with most weight below the waist. I could probably get away with a small and a half if that were a real size but this feels very comfortable and compliments my shape well. Very pleased.
I love this jacket firs great
Love it! Looks just like on the picture. Im 5'1 and 128lb i bought a Small size fit perfect
